title: Jagged Spear
content:
Characters need to master certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain a special Actions while holding it.

The point of this spear is blackened and melted - the uneven metal is designed to catch deep in the wounds it creates.

Jagged Spear Location & Where to Find

Location: Can be found at Shattered Sanctum, next to Torturer Spike and his victim. Quest: Crafting: Merchant: Dropped by: Torturer Spike

Jagged Spear Notes & Tips

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 10 Gp Weight: 1.35 Kg. ID
